data.title: Neural Network From Scratch
data.description: Implemented a multi-layer perceptron neural network and used it to classify data from different data sets including spiral, xor, circle and gaussian. Resulted in 90%+ accuracy.

data.title: AI Agent Playing Go
data.description: Developed an AI Agent leveraging mini-max algorithm to play Go using Python; got 100% winning rate with random, greedy and aggressive players.
